channel.title: coffee on The Rules
channel.description: Recent content in coffee on The Rules

item.title: #10 - Greed
item.description: Tell me, what is that? Some sort of greed to fill up your coffee mug full up to the rim? Like that: And then, with a peculiar gait, trying not to spill it, carry it to a dining table. I just looked through my window and didn’t see a war, or a burst of hunger there, which would cause us to fights for every single ounce and milliliter of boiling water for our drinks.
